Storage Service Provider (SSP): A Storage Service Provider is a company that
provides computer storage space and related management services.1
Storage management handled by SSP Backup/Recovery
SSP does remote backup/recovery Data protection
SSP provides encryption/protection of data Replication
SSP replicates data for better performance/availability Archiving
SSP archives data as mandated by law
Originally generated by each industry or town
Now generated centrally and distributed as a utility
End-users dont have to deal with power station management
Later moved to NAS, SAN etc
End users deal with storage management
Cost of storage management is 5 to 7 times that of hardware2
Local storage management can take up to 70% of total IT budget3
